ssGUI::​Factory
ssGUI::​Factory

<Extension>s & <EventCallback>s must be created and disposed via this class.  You can also create GUI Objects via this class but it is not required.

Functions
Create< template<typename T> class Wrapper, typename T>
template< template<typename T> class Wrapper, typename T> static Wrapper<T>* Create()

Creates the object on the heap

Create<typename T>
template<typename T> static T* Create()

Creates the object on the heap
